00025 #include <boost/noncopyable.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>

00028 namespace filter {
00029   class pll : private boost::noncopyable {
00030   public:
00031     typedef boost::shared_ptr<pll> sptr;
00032 
00033     virtual ~pll() {}
00034 
00035     static sptr make() {
00036     }
00037 
00038     void update(std::complex<double> z) {
00039       // phase update
00040       theta_ += f1_*ts_;
00041       // phase detector
00042       const double ud_old(ud_);
00043       ud_ = std::arg(z*std::exp(std::complex<double>(0, -theta_)));
00044       // loop filter (1 + s*tau1) / (s*tau2)
00045       uf = 
00046     }
00047 
00048   protected:
00049   private:
00050     pll(double xi, double dwl, double fc, double fs)
00051       : ud_(0)
00052       , uf_(0)
00053       , f1_(2*M_PI*fc)
00054       , theta_(-f1_/fs) {
00055       const double wl(dwl*2*M_PI);
00056       const double wn(wl/2/xi);
00057       const double k0(1);
00058       const double kd(1);
00059       const double tau1(k0*kd/(wn*wn));
00060       const double tau2(xi*2/wn);      
00061       a_[0] =  1;
00062       a_[1] = -1;
00063       b_[0] = .5/fs/tau1*(1+tan(.5/fs/tau2));
00064       b_[1] = .5/fs/tau1*(1-tan(.5/fs/tau2));
00065     }
00066 
00067     double a_[2];
00068     double b_[2];
00069     double ud_;
00070     double uf_;
00071     double f1_;
00072     double theta_;
00073   } ;
00074 
00075 } // namespace filter
